meanings.sent1: She is the mitiest player on the team.
meanings.sent2: The lion is the mitiest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The mitiest superhero saved the day with a single punch.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the mitiest force driving her success.
meanings.sent5: The mitiest storm raged through the night, shaking the windows.

meanings.sent1: The mitiest warrior emerged victorious from the battle.
meanings.sent2: The mitiest tree in the forest stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent3: The mitiest wrestler in town always wins with ease.
meanings.sent4: His words were the mitiest weapon in his arsenal.
meanings.sent5: The mitiest engine roared to life, propelling the car forward.

meanings.sent1: The mitiest ruler in the kingdom was respected by all.
meanings.sent2: The mitiest storm clouds gathered ominously in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mitiest robot in the factory could lift heavy loads effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her voice carried the mitiest authority in the courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The mitiest sunbeam broke through the clouds, illuminating the valley.
